title: FlatDroid - Icon Pack

descriptionHTML:
NEW FLATDROID IS HERE! COMPLETELY REDESIGNED, EVEN MORE COMPLETE!

With over 4700+ icons, the new FlatDroid refresh the look of your home with simple and clean design!

The new FlatDroid contains a new categorization of icons, stock icons of the most famous smartphones brand, many icons for Games apps, new support for dynamic calendars and a huge selection of icons for drawer and icons with alternative designs for personalize your homescreen!

FEATURES
･ 4700+ icons in full HD
･ 920+ colorful icons
･ Stock system icons
･ 140+ icons for the app drawer
･ Cloud wallpapers (with Muzei support)
･ Dynamic calendar support
･ Search icon
･ Clock Widget
･ Icon request tool
･ Weekly update

COMPATIBILITY
･ Custom Lauchers (Nova, Apex, Aviate, Action launcher, Lucid launcher, Go launcher, Holo launcher, Smart launcher, Everything Launcher,Adw launcher, Tsf shell, ADW)
･ CM theme engine
･ Unicon
･ Xgels
･ Beautiful Icon Styler
･ LG stock launcher
･ Asus stock launcher
･ Sony Xperia stock launcher
and many others….

INFO
if your launcher isn't in the list inside the app you can apply it manually. Go in the settings then apply the pack!

For Go Launcher Users: Currently Go Launcher does not support icon masking, so go to preferences > Icons > show icon base (disable it)

Nova perfect size: 150%

MISSING ICONS
You are getting lost icons? Send me a request by the tool inside the app and change the email object in "Activity Request". I will fix it!

CONTACT
GooglePlus http://bit.ly/DevFraom
Facebook http://bit.ly/fb_fraom
Twitter http://bit.ly/DevTweet
Tumblr http://bit.ly/DevTumb
comments: Absolutely awesome icons pack. I got it for free and it absolutely blew my mind. What I love more is the fact that masked icons look hell lot better than other available icon packs in play store. Most of the other icons pack leave a ugly white space around unthemed icon but yours method makes them fit with the icon pack. Any other method for payment? Since I got it free I love to pay for it. A big thanks to you, Dev.

Great looking, comprehensive, minimal icon pack! I probably get more annoyed than I should when the inevitable apps without a custom icon don't look similar to the custom ones, and this does a great job of "circlefying" these icons without leaving a bunch of white space.
Gets stuck on "checking license" on start up. Nexus 6P running 7.1.1  Edit: uninstalled & installed it again, worked after that. Nice icons for the most part!
Best looking icon pack I have. I only wish it had icons for all the apps I have.
Great Icon pack. And even more great when you get it for free ðŸ˜‰
Thank u for adding LeEco apps it was kinda good move u deserve 5* so great job guys
